Angular New Router

Guide

  • Animation- This document describes how to add CSS animations to router components.
  • Authoring Components- Components are reusable, routable, etc.
  • # redirectTo- Useful for migrating to a new URL scheme, setting up defaults...
  • Getting Started- These are instuctions for starting a new app with the New Router with AngularJS 1.4.
  • Component Lifecycle Hooks- There are four main lifecycle hooks: [`canActivate`](#can-activate), [`activate`](#activate), and [`canDeactivate`](#can-deactivate), and [`deactivate`](#deactivate).

API

  • ngFuturisticRouter - A module for adding new a routing system Angular 1.
  • routerComponentDirective - A component is:
  • routerViewPort - A routerViewPort is where resolved content goes.
  • componentLoaderProvider - This lets you configure conventions for what controllers are named and where to load templates from.
